title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama: same features as Python SDK but for Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama WebUI): ChatGPT-like interface, model manager, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: sync/async APIs, streaming, embeddings, custom timeouts, Maven Central.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama: strongly-typed client, async tokio support, generate & chat endpoints.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension powered by Ollama: inline completions, chat panel, local only.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes: GPU node selector, PVC, autoscaling, service mesh ready.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example using ollama-js: Next.js, streaming, Tailwind, deploy to Vercel.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Community registry of function-calling tools for Ollama: weather, GitHub, Slack, Postgres, etc.

title: ollama-gpt-crawler
summary: Crawl a site, generate QA pairs with Ollama, export JSONL for fine-tuning or RAG ingestion.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats and generates images via Ollama: slash commands, thread support, role gating.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama HTTP API: GenServer pooling, streaming, LiveView examples.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter exposing Ollama as @Service: auto-config, POJO chat records, WebFlux streaming.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced CLI for Ollama written in Go: interactive model picker, conversation history, fzf search.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG stack with Ollama, Chroma, LangChain: ingest PDFs, query via CLI or REST.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama: same API as ollama-js repo, zero native deps.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama: lightweight wrapper over REST, no heavy deps.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Subreddit for Ollama users: model requests, troubleshooting, showcase, ecosystem news.
